text:
Hey, the showreel is looking really nice. I o when yiu have a couple of very similar shots from the same sequence, you only need a breakdown for one, also there are some passes you can't really read on Vimeo, like grain. So you can probably cut the number of passes a bit.

The keying shot looks promising, is your matchmove tight? Looks a little slippy slidy.

attachments.title: Join the Keep Calm, I'm in VFX Discord Server!
attachments.text: Check out the Keep Calm, I'm in VFX community on Discord - hang out with 637 other members and enjoy free voice and text chat.
attachments.fallback: Discord: Join the Keep Calm, I'm in VFX Discord Server!

text: Mock interview is a great opportunity and of course gives you a chance to build a rapport with the recruiter. Follow up with a polite LinkedIn request and a thank you so you stay on their radar!
Thank you! That's a good point. I'll take one of the paume ones off. I'll cut down the passes too. Ah, I forgot about the matchmove! One of my peers told me about that too. Odds are it is lff

off*

Yeah, they've both been really great so far. He said I could email him my reel so I've done that as well as connecting on LinkedIn. I've joined the discord too, thank you for that!
